title: Best retrieval strategies for Generative AI applications: Semantic Search Benchmarking
description:
🚀 Get ready for a search revolution! 🕵️‍♂️
 
In this episode, we'll review findings of an extensive assessment of retrieval modes in Azure Cognitive Search and other leading search providers. 🌐📊 Discover how these findings lay the foundation for adopting a hybrid retrieval and reranking strategy, especially designed for out-of-the-box Generative AI scenarios. 🔄🧠
 
But that's not all! The insights derived from this cutting-edge research extend far beyond AI, offering invaluable benefits to various general search use cases. 📈🌍

Chapters:
00:00 Welcome to the AI Show
00:15 On today's show 
00:46 Understanding search options 
04:35 Semantic Search demo
12:14 "Chat with your data" Solution Accelerator
12:57 Learn more
